/user/:userId {get}: get user by id with get method
/user/:userId {put}: update user by id with put method
/user/:userId {delete}: delete user by id with delete method
/movie/new/:cinemaId {post}: create movie by id with get method
/movie/:movieId {get}: get movie by id with get method
/movie/:movieId {put}: update movie by id with put method
/movie/:movieId {delete}: delete movie by id with delete method
/movies/by/:cinemaId {get}: get all movie by cinema with get method
